data.description: Adds MySQL specific methods to Time::Piece
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This provides some simple MySQL-specific methods for Time::Piece
    objects. I discussed it with Matt Sergeant and he didn't have any
    qualms about me uploading this module.

    BTW, the module list still has Time::Object listed, but that
    namespace has been retired in favor of Time::Piece, by fiat of the
    pumpking.
